channel.title: Commands on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Commands on PR

item.title: Poor man's pdf diff tool
item.description: Recently a client shared updated requirement document, unfortunately the document was in PDF and I don’t want to go through 60+ pages of document for changes.

item.title: Disable networking/internet from command line on a Mac
item.description: If you want to quickly disable internet/networking to test offline features. Doing it frequently with System preferences GUI is quite a slow workflow.

item.title: How to view (Windows) line ending characters on Mac OSX
item.description: Notepad++ on windows has this beautiful option “View all characters” to display all invisbile characters such as line endings. Programming editors on mac like Textwrangler and Textmate has an option to Show Invisibles but failed to display the character block for Carriage Return as Notepad used to.

item.title: Import Delicious bookmarks to Evernote including tags
item.description: It is unfortunate to know that Yahoo is going to shutdown/transfer the awesome Delicious bookmarking service. Evernote does not support direct import of bookmarks from delicious as it does with Google notebook.

item.title: Mac App Store - Source
item.description: You get the idea? You are not looking for the UI code are you? Saurik will be doing the UI for us ;)

item.title: Solving Read-Only Notes.app issue
item.description: Notes.app of miPhone was not allowing me to save any new notes. This was after restoring the manual backup of notes.

item.title: Batch renaming of files (Mac OSX / *nix)
item.description: How to batch/bulk rename files with automatic sequence number? Try the following shell script from your terminal (OSX/*nix) Create a new directory
